metadata.name: A Dance of Colours
metadata.description:
My first mint on Manifold!

Three points moving around randomly with Perlin noise, with the distance from each point determining red, green or blue pixel values.

[View full screen](https://uekqov2vv7oet5clpb3hvkfnrvjcpu77wtuhes4ugjmrttxij76a.arweave.net/oRUHV1Wv3En0S3h2eqitjVIn0_-06HJLlDJZGc7oT_w/)

This dynamic artwork is intended to be viewed within an NFT marketplace that supports HTML NFTs, or directly on the Arweave permanent storage. It uses the p5.js JavaScript library. Third party license information can be found in license.txt.
